nodes.name: DETECTION_High_Priority_Falco_Alert
nodes.lql:
`select Case When lower(priority)="emergency" Then 10.0
When lower(priority)="alert" Then 9.0
When lower(priority)="critical" Then 8.0
Else 0.0
End As lhub_score
, "A high priority Falco alert was observed" AS reason, * from Falco_Event_Normalization where lower(priority) IN ("emergency", "alert", "critical")`

nodes.name: High_Priority_Falco_Alert_FINAL
nodes.lql:
`select lhub_score, concat("High priority Falco alert: ",log_rule) AS alertTitle,

printf('A High priority Falco alert has been observed:

USERNAME: %s

RULE NAME: %s

TIMES TRIGGERED: %s

K8S NAMESPACES: %s

K8S POD NAMES: %s

HOST NAMES: %s

POD NAMES: %s

COMMANDS: %s

First seen: %s

Last seen: %s

', username, log_rule, _count, k8s_namespace, k8s_podname, host, pod, proc_cmdline, from_unixtime(first_seen/1000),from_unixtime(last_seen/1000)) as alertDetails
from DETECTION_High_Priority_Falco_Alert`

nodes.name: All_cases
nodes.lql: `select *, "anthony.morris@logichub.com" as reporter from High_Priority_Falco_Alert_FINAL where lhub_score>7`

data.name: Falco
data.query: _sourceCategory = *falco* output_fields rule priority output NOT "Falco internal"

connectionTypeDetail.query: _sourceCategory = *falco* output_fields rule priority output NOT "Falco internal"

modules.name: Smart Case Creation (v1 OLD)
modules.description: Preserving temporarily in case we need to revert back from v2; otherwise do not use.

templateNodes.name: Collect_Case_Sets
templateNodes.templateLQL: `select collect_set(result__status) as caseDisposition, collect_set(concat(result__id,":",result__status)) AS caseCollection from filter_out_closed_cases GROUP BY result__title `

templateNodes.name: Determine_Next_Action
templateNodes.templateLQL: `SELECT *, CASE WHEN array_contains(caseDisposition, "todo") THEN "Append To Case" WHEN array_contains(caseDisposition, "inprogress") THEN "Append To Case" ELSE "newCase" END AS nextAction FROM Module_StartChild1 WHERE GET_JSON_OBJECT(lhub_execution_metadata, '$.batch_url') != ''`

templateNodes.name: Add_Required_Case_Fields
templateNodes.templateLQL: `select "%%%reporter%%%" AS reporter, "todo" AS status, "Low" as priority, * from Determine_Which_Alerts_Need_New_Cases`

templateNodes.name: Append_To_Cases_Step1
templateNodes.templateLQL: `SELECT *, explode(caseCollection) FROM Determine_Next_Action WHERE nextAction = "Append To Case"`

templateNodes.name: Append_To_Cases_Filter_Done
templateNodes.templateLQL: `SELECT * FROM Append_To_Cases_Step1 WHERE NOT col REGEXP ":done"`

templateNodes.name: Append_To_Cases_Final
templateNodes.templateLQL: `SELECT "%%%reporter%%%" AS reporter, *, concat_ws(', ', slice(caseSplit, 0, 1)) AS caseToAppendTo FROM Append_To_Cases_Split`

templateNodes.name: Module_StartChild1
templateNodes.templateLQL:
`select L.case_reporter_within_module, L.case_title_within_module, L.case_description_within_module, L.lhub_execution_metadata, R.result__title, R.caseDisposition, R.caseCollection
from Module_Start L
LEFT JOIN Collect_Case_SetsChild1 R
ON L.case_title_within_module=R.result__title `

templateNodes.name: Module_Start
templateNodes.templateLQL: `select *, %%%reporter%%% as case_reporter_within_module, %%%case_title%%% as case_title_within_module, %%%case_description%%% as case_description_within_module from reformat_dedupe_key`

templateNodes.name: Ensure_final_fields
templateNodes.templateLQL: ensureTableHasColumns(Extract_JSON_from_output_fields, "_raw, _raw__log, _raw__log__output_fields, _raw__log__output_fields__container_image_repository, _raw__log__output_fields__k8s_ns_name, _raw__log__output_fields__k8s_pod_name, _raw__log__output_fields__proc_cmdline, _raw__log__output_fields__user_name, _raw__log__output, _raw__log__priority, _raw__log__rule, cluster, container, host, namespace, node, pod")

templateNodes.name: Normalize_fields
templateNodes.templateLQL: `SELECT lhub_ts, _raw__log__output_fields__container_image_repository AS container_image_repository, _raw__log__output_fields__k8s_ns_name AS k8s_namespace, _raw__log__output_fields__k8s_pod_name AS k8s_podname, _raw__log__output_fields__proc_cmdline AS proc_cmdline, _raw__log__output_fields__user_name AS username, _raw__log__output AS log_output, _raw__log__priority AS priority, _raw__log__rule AS log_rule, cluster, container, host, namespace, node, pod FROM Ensure_final_fields`

templateNodes.name: Aggregate_baseline_output
templateNodes.templateLQL: `select count(*) _count, min(lhub_ts) as first_seen, max(lhub_ts) as last_seen from Normalize_fields group by container_image_repository, k8s_namespace, k8s_podname, proc_cmdline, username, priority, log_rule, cluster, container, host, namespace, node, pod`

inputs.label: Task Reporter

inputs.label: Task Description Template

inputs.description: Jinja2 template for parameters of the task. Input is expected in json format {"key1": "val1", "key2": "val2"}. You can either pass json of command directly or use jinja2 template like {{taskParamColumnName}}
inputs.label: Task Parameters Template

inputs.description: Select trigger type of task. (Default is Automatic)
inputs.label: Trigger Type
